item.title: End CA-247 South at CA-62
item.description: End CA-247 south at CA-62. Use CA-62 east for 29 Palms; use CA-62 east for I-10 and Morongo Valley.

item.title: CA-247 South at CA-18
item.description: CA-247 south at CA-18. This is not the true junction with CA-18, which lies a little to the south and east. Use CA-18 west for Victorville; use CA-18 east for Big Bear Lake; use CA-247 south for 29 Palms.

item.title: I-15 South at CA-247
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 183 offramp at CA-247 jct. Turn left for CA-247, Barstow Road.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 183
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 183 - CA-247/Barstow Road. Use CA-247 south for Lucerne Valley and Big Bear Lake.

item.title: End I-40 West Approaching I-15 Exit 183
item.description: End I-40 west at I-15. Approaching I-15 Exit 183 - CA-247/Barstow Road.

item.title: CA-62 East at CA-247 North
item.description: CA-62 east approaching CA-247 North/Old Woman Springs Road

item.title: CA-62 East at CA-247 North
item.description: CA-62 east at CA-247 north to Landers, Lucerne Valley, and Victorville
